explains: n. 考官，主考人；审查人，检查人
wordGroup: medical examiner 验尸员；体检医生；医学检查者

sentences.en: As an examiner, she showed no favour to any candidate.
sentences.cn: 作为主考人她没有偏袒任何应试者。

sentences.en: A medical examiner has listed the deaths as homicides.
sentences.cn: 验尸官已将这些死亡列为他杀案件。

sentences.en: Check out an article written about him in the San Francisco Examiner by clicking on the link below.
sentences.cn: 点击下面的链接，可以在《旧金山观察家报》中查看一篇关于他的文章。
